"We're back!": "Oh! You made it! I'm so glad you're alright!"
"Taivas and Tulli told me all about how you helped them out."
"Oh, yeah. We met them out in the field."
"Thank you for helping my brothers."
"Don't worry about it. Helping people is the right thing to do."
"Let me give you a hand."
"Okay... thank you."
"I wiped out the entire DOLLS nest... But there was no sign of Ilma at all."
"I see... We've combed the whole region at this point. Hmm..."
"Ilma would always come up with the perfect ideas at times like these."
"But he's not here..."
"I know that."
"Okay! We'll just have to go back over the whole place with a fine-toothed comb! Surely there must be something we've overlooked."
"...There is one more place I want to check."
"Hm? Where's that?"
"Lost Central..."
"What are you saying! That place is off-limits!"
"Ilma had been showing a lot of interest in the old city... but I don't think he'd go near there."
"But that's the only place we haven't looked."
"No way! It's too dangerous!"
"As the oldest sibling, I forbid you from going! You've been going off on your own too much anyway!"
"Got it? Now is the time when teamwork is most important!"
"That's enough, you two."
"What would Grandpa say if he saw us like this..."
"...Grandpa."
"Kukka, where are you going?"
